abstract: Twitter users can already send their tweets to Facebook. Now Facebook users can do the reverse with an app called SocialToo.
snippet: Twitter users can already send their tweets to Facebook. Now Facebook users can do the reverse with an app called SocialToo.
lead_paragraph: Many social networkers have found it too burdensome to constantly update their statuses on both Facebook and Twitter. As a result, some have been neglecting Facebook. Instead, they keep their friends on both sites informed by setting up Twitter to automatically post tweets on Facebook, and they never have to visit the site.

headline.main: Will Twitter-to-Facebook Publishing Make You Tweet Less?
